FIELD.NAME: HEADER-VERSION
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Version Number for this message description.

FIELD.NAME: MESSAGE-TYPE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Message type identifier: REQ, RESP, or MSG

FIELD.NAME: MESSAGE-SUBTYPE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Unique message identifier, fixed for GMSEC Standard Messages

FIELD.NAME: CONTENT-VERSION
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Version Number for this message content description

FIELD.NAME: MSG-ID
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Echo of the MSG-ID field from the Simple Service Request message.

FIELD.NAME: RESPONSE-STATUS
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Identifies the status of the Simple Service being processed. (1: Acknowledgement, 2: Working/keep alive, 3: Successful completino, 4: Failed completion, 5: Invalid Request, 6: Final Message)

FIELD.NAME: TIME-COMPLETED
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Time application completed processing the Simple Service

FIELD.NAME: RETURN-VALUE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Return value or status based on the RESPONSE-STATUS. Provides additional status information particular to the request.

FIELD.NAME: DATA
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Additional data that may accompany the response
